review: I had missng  two teeth in my lower jaw and had chewing problem.  When I visited the Dr she told me about replacing my missing tooth with a fixed bridge  or a removable  denture.  I opted for the  fixed bridge and it took just 2 sittngs to complete  my treatment  and my new teeth were exactly  like my existing  teeth.  are

I had visited  Dr Madhulika's clinic in February.  I was having  trouble and pain and swelling my lower front  teeth and could not take any food . She immediately  did some treatment  after which my pain got relieved to a large extent.  Later she did RCT with crown on these 4 teeth and I am doing well after that. The entire  treatment was painless and I am highly  satisfied with the end result.
I got a scaling, polishing  and tooth whitening  treatment  done from Dr Madhulika.  She is very experienced  in. her job . The clinic  is very hygiene and  the staffs are very cordial.
I have done Root Canal Treatment from Dr Madhulika Madam . She is an excellent Doctor. This was my 1st dental visit and I am highly satisfied with her treatment.
